document_data.name: Churin
document_data.mainbody: '''Churin''' was the warehouse manager of [[Gaspar]] the fishmonger in [[Easthaven]] within the [[Ten Towns]] of [[Icewind Dale]].
document_data.Description: The manager dressed in yellowish clothing.
document_data.Activities: Churin owned a warehouse in the village and was paid by Gaspar to store [[knucklehead trout]] and other emergency supplies.
document_data.History: During [[Eleint]], [[1281 DR]], Churin anticipated a shipment of supplies to aid Easthaven in the coming winter for Gaspar from [[Ilmus Gallaway]], but the caravan from [[Caer-Dineval]] was ambushed by an [[ogre]] raider and his [[orc]] henchmen.
